CustomField.description: If checked, sort orders from child filters or a custom sort field can be used instead of the default max/min sort. If unchecked, max/min rollup will be sorted by the source field.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If checked, sort orders from child filters or a custom sort field can be used instead of the default max/min sort. If unchecked, max/min rollup will be sorted by the source field.
CustomField.label: Disable Default Max/Min Sort
